f275747c-1bbb-4797-8b17-08161ddc1396.description: Badge holders are at the top of the BRM profession, having learned and practiced the skills and strategies employed by top BRMs in the industry. They have completed a rigorous experiential workshop that enables them to develop the skillset needed to become a top performing BRM, use empathy and human connection to develop meaningful relationships with stakeholders, positively impact their organization via immersion, assessment, action, and optimization, and drive organizational growth.
f275747c-1bbb-4797-8b17-08161ddc1396.name: The High Performing BRM Designation

badge_template_activities.title: Earners not only learn the key skills and strategies needed to become an impactful BRM, they learn how to apply those skills and strategies to execute the role. They have completed the workshop lessons that teach key topic areas employed by the top BRMs in the industry, and then workshop exercises to put that learning to use. Earners of this badge are not only ready to perform the BRM role; they are ready to do it at a top level and make a strong impact to their organization.
